description:
Ayurveda - The Missing Link in Yoga covers the Fundamental Principles of the Science of Life. Explore how to create balance in mind, body and spirit as you journey through a discovery of the elements, the energies and the mind. Uncover a new sense of self as you learn why it is you naturally react as you do to your environment. Delve into practical tools to help realign your Yoga Practice to bring a new sense of connectedness.

This course is delivered in English using video format over 4 sessions. Each session introduces a theoretical element with practical strategies to really integrate the Link between Yoga and Ayurveda.

Discover a new way....an experience that helps to amalgamate the sister sciences today

And extend your leaning - enroll in The Missing Link 2 with video footage to extend your learning experiences
title: Yoga - Linking the Ancient Wisdom of Ayurveda
